channel.title: Yell command
channel.description:
hey guys i was wondering when you yell on servers it says in colours:
[owner] name [moderator] name [administrator] name [donator] name
how do you make it say that? could someone please tell me a code for it please
cheers btw i am using pr0digyscape 317 client and source i think it is delta im not sure. im not an expert so thanks guys. ;D

[administrator] name
[donator] name

how do you make it say that? could someone please tell me a code for it please

cheers btw i am using pr0digyscape 317 client and source i think it is delta im not
sure. im not an expert so thanks guys.
;D[/quote]
CTRL-F
